title: You are in fact sending a reference to your LeakyActivity instance to foo. When the user navigates away from your LeakyActivity, this reference can prevent the LeakyActivity instance from being garbage collected. This is a serious leak as activities hold a reference to their entire view hierarchy and are therefore rather large objects in memory.
